acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped float values with @PodamFloatValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleFloatValuesWithThePodamFloatValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.FloatValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Float value 0.0 should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the float value 66.13175 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the float value 311.79126 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Float value 0.0 should be greater or equal than 0.0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the float value 57.708702 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the float value 845.8161 should be between 0.0 and 1000.0
Then the float value 123456.0 should be precisely 123456.0
Then the Object should not be null
Then the float value 123456.0 should be precisely 123456.0
